result.ga: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamh
result.orig: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamh
result.html: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamhIt would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
result.ponchtml: Ḃeaḋ sé uilig ṫart anois agus ḃeinn as buaireaṁIt would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.

result.eng: There's no point saying anything.
result.ga: Níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.orig: Níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.html: Níl gar a bheith ag caintThere's no point saying anything.
result.ponchtml: Níl gar a ḃeiṫ ag caintThere's no point saying anything.
